at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight

Class LevelSelectionSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.TTLSurfaceView
          • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

    public class LevelSelectionSurfaceView
extends TTLSurfaceView
    Draws the level selection screen. For each level either a "normal" or a "diamond" border, the number of the level, the highscore, the best achieved time and the achieved medals (bronze, medal, gold) are displayed.
    If a touch ACTION_UP event on a level entry is registered, the activity GameActivity is started. The intent is parameterized by the corresponding LevelInfo object.
    Author:
    Thomas Koch

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition
      Holds the LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition.number of the Level and the top and left position of the level entry.

    • Method Detail

      • loadLevels

        private void loadLevels()
        Iterates through the image resources levelx and levelxcollision, where x is LevelInfo.number - 1, queries the score (best time and highscore) from the database and adds a LevelInfo object containing these variables for each level to the levels list levels.

      • drawLevelInfos

        private void drawLevelInfos(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Iterates through the levels according to LEVEL_COUNT. Calculates the top and left position for each level and adds a LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition object containing these values to levelInfoPositions. For each level a border, the achieved medals, the number of the level, the best time and the highscore is drawn. A diamond border is drawn if the highscore is greater than the largest score in the resource file levelx_medal_points, where x is LevelInfo.number - 1. The resource file also decides which medals are displayed.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas which is drawn on

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        If a touch ACTION_UP event on a level entry is registered, the GameActivity activity is started and parameterized by the corresponding LevelInfo.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        event - The touch event to react to.
        Returns:
        Whether the event was handled. Always true.
